name: Anime Screencap Style LoRA
description:
Anime Screencap Style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

UPDATE: v3 is here!

  • v3 should be used at around weight 1 on AnyLoRA ckpt or similar style neutral models.

  • v3 is trained from ALL my anime screencap datasets, the same I used for all my specific anime models. It should retain "some" styles if you use the trigger words from those, but it's never gonna be accurate to one specific style.

  • v2 is more "magazine" style and should be used at around 0.3 weight. Trigger keyword is anime screencap.


How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
